mapper.select: SELECT `user_id` as `userId`, `refresh_token` as `refreshToken`, `shard_id` as `shardId`, `last_login` as `lastLogin` FROM `user_info` WHERE `user_id` = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `user_info` ( `user_id`, `refresh_token`, `shard_id`, `last_login`, `created`, `modified` ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{refreshToken}, #{shardId}, NOW(), NOW(), NOW() )
